mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I strolled into a gourmet coffee shop, expecting my favorite latte, but horror of horrors, they were out of almond milk! The nerve, right? I demanded to see the manager, declared a latte emergency, and 30 minutes later, behold-a fresh shipment of almond milk arrived, all for one latte. My entitlement knows no bounds, but hey, desperate times call for desperate measures. A latte without almond milk? I think not. Cheers to me, the hero of caffeinated justice!
